mcq.statement: Identify the sentence with correct punctuation usage:  My favorite hobbies include reading knitting and cooking.

options.a: My favorite hobbies include reading knitting and cooking.
options.b: It's raining outside, however, I brought my umbrella.
options.c: The concert was amazing - I've never heard such talented musicians.
options.d: The professor's lecture was long; therefore it was informative.
